availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Arthur T. Daugherty (Franklin County, Kentucky miller)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky miller. Kentucky native. Married Mary Francis Crutcher Daugherty on December 23, 1853. Father of Lavinia Daugherty, Martha Daugherty, Mary Daugherty and Thomas G. Daugherty. Employed as a miller in Woodford County in 1860. Served in Company H, 1st Regiment Capitol Guards from July 1, 1864 to January 12, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 762.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Franklin County Marriages, Film #994034, p. 3.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Franklin County Births, Film #994034, p. 4.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, p. 956
